title: Securing Agentic AI: Threat Modeling and Risk Analysis for Network Monitoring Agentic AI System
summary: When combining Large Language Models (LLMs) with autonomous agents, used in network monitoring and decision-making systems, this will create serious security issues. In this research, the MAESTRO framework consisting of the seven layers threat modeling architecture in the system was used to expose, evaluate, and eliminate vulnerabilities of agentic AI.
